StylistChatter.Chatter_1: I offered {Bartender} a free trim, but he refused. I mean, I could have at least worked on his mustache!

StylistSpecialText.Graveyard1: Eek! This deathly atmosphere is ruining my perm!
StylistSpecialText.Graveyard2: I kinda want to go out there and collect heads of hair for wigs, but I kinda don't want to GO OUT THERE!
StylistSpecialText.Party: I may have gotten my hair done up just for today, but honestly, I just want to pop balloons with my scissors.
StylistSpecialText.Rain1: That totally will not do. Soggy rat is not a hairstyle!
StylistSpecialText.Rain2: What?! It's raining? I just got a perm!
StylistSpecialText.Storm1: I'm staying inside! The Einstein look is NOT in fashion.
StylistSpecialText.Storm2: Like, really? This crazy storm is bad for business!
StylistSpecialText.Windy1: Want windswept hair? Go outside, it's free.
StylistSpecialText.Windy2: Ugh! I should just take the day off, this wind will blow away all my hard work!

TownNPCMood_Stylist.DislikeBiome: Hun, I don't like it here in {BiomeName}, how can anyone show off their hair when it's so cold?
TownNPCMood_Stylist.DislikeCrowded: Am I hearing spiders? Oh, just noisy neighbors, I don't like that.
TownNPCMood_Stylist.DislikeNPC: I tried to work on {NPCName}, but was rudely rejected, I don't like stubborn people!
TownNPCMood_Stylist.FarFromHome: I'm too far from my tools...
TownNPCMood_Stylist.HateBiome: Ugh, {BiomeName} is causing severe damage to my hair!
TownNPCMood_Stylist.HateCrowded: I absolutely cannot stand having so many people living around me, I can't focus.
TownNPCMood_Stylist.HateNPC: I hate {NPCName}, how can you literally NOT grow hair?
TownNPCMood_Stylist.LikeBiome: It's nice, calm atmosphere for cutting hair in {BiomeName}.
TownNPCMood_Stylist.LikeNPC: {NPCName} is strong and mysterious. I like that.
TownNPCMood_Stylist.LikeNPC_Princess: I can't even touch {NPCName}'s hair, it's too perfect!
TownNPCMood_Stylist.LoveNPC: {NPCName} is quite the looker... so exotic... I think I'm in love...
TownNPCMood_Stylist.LoveSpace: Lovely, I get to keep to myself and study my technique without distraction.
TownNPCMood_Stylist.NoHome: Sorry hun, I can't style hair without a place to set up my station.
